at the beginning of your upkeep you may exile all cards from your hand face down if you do put all other cards you own exiled with cardname into your hand
at the beginning of your upkeep each opponent draws a card
at the beginning of your upkeep you may put a verse counter on cardname
at the beginning of your upkeep you may flip a coin if you win the flip put a fuse counter on cardname if you lose the flip remove a fuse counter from cardname

at the beginning of your upkeep if you control a basecolor or basecolor permanent cardname deals n damage to target creature if you control a basecolor permanent and a basecolor permanent cardname deals n damage instead

at the beginning of your end step mill a card if a land card was milled this way you gain n life otherwise cardname deals n damage to each opponent to mill a card put the top card of your library into your graveyard
at the beginning of your upkeep you may put a treasure counter on cardname
at the beginning of your upkeep you may have two target players exchange life totals
at the beginning of your upkeep draw a card if you control a creature with the greatest power among creatures on the battlefield otherwise put a plus n plus n counter on a creature you control
at the beginning of your upkeep discard a card at random if you discard a creature card this way return it from your graveyard to the battlefield unless any player pays n life

at the beginning of your upkeep if you control a basecolor or basecolor permanent target player loses n life if you control a basecolor permanent and a basecolor permanent that player loses n life instead
at the beginning of your upkeep you may gain n life
at the beginning of your upkeep you may pay genericmana and n life if you do return a card exiled with cardname to the battlefield
at the beginning of your upkeep you lose n life
at the beginning of your upkeep you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield that creature gains haste until end of turn exile it at the beginning of the next end step
at the beginning of your upkeep choose one
at the beginning of your upkeep you may put an infection counter on cardname
at the beginning of your upkeep you may put a fungus counter on target nontoken creature
at the beginning of your upkeep you may exchange control of cardname and target permanent you neither own nor control
at the beginning of your upkeep you may look at the top card of your library if it's a creature card you may reveal it and put a quest counter on cardname

at the beginning of your upkeep if you control a basecolor or basecolor permanent draw a card then discard a card if you control a basecolor permanent and a basecolor permanent instead draw two cards then discard a card
at the beginning of your end step you may sacrifice a nontoken creature if you do create x n n basecolor wolf creature tokens where x is the sacrificed creature's toughness
at the beginning of your upkeep if you control an artifact create a n n colorless thopter artifact creature token with flying
at the beginning of your upkeep you may remove a vitality counter from cardname if you do you gain n life

at the beginning of your upkeep if you control a basecolor or basecolor permanent target creature gets plus n plus n until end of turn if you control a basecolor permanent and a basecolor permanent that creature gets plus n plus n until end of turn instead
at the beginning of your upkeep sacrifice a creature
at the beginning of your upkeep you gain n life
at the beginning of your upkeep you may pay x life if you do untap x permanents
at the beginning of your upkeep you may search your library and or graveyard for a shrine card and put it onto the battlefield if you search your library this way shuffle
at the beginning of your upkeep scry n
at the beginning of your upkeep you may look at the top card of target opponent's library if you do you may put that card on the bottom of that player's library
at the beginning of your upkeep mill two cards
at the beginning of your upkeep you may search your library for a basic land card reveal that card put it into your hand then shuffle if you do you skip your draw step this turn
at the beginning of your upkeep you may mill a card
at the beginning of your upkeep each player discards a card
at the beginning of your upkeep you may mill two cards
